scripts.installAll: npm run installModules && npm run installBackendModules
scripts.build: npm run build-static && npm run build-backend && rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build/static && cp -r backend/build/* backend/mysql-config.json backend/node_modules build && cp -r dist/* build/static/ && echo full build complete! && echo
scripts.build-windows: npm run build-static && npm run build-backend && echo backend build complete! && powershell -Executionpolicy RemoteSigned -noprofile -noninteractive "new-item -Path build/ -Name static -ItemType directory -Force | Out-Null" && powershell copy-item backend/build/*,backend/mysql-config.json,backend/node_modules -Destination build -recurse -Force && powershell copy-item -Path dist/* -Destination build/static/ -recurse -Force && echo full build complete! && echo:
scripts.docker-deploy: echo HEADS UP! && echo This requires that you are logged into the robotics DockerHub account within the terminal && echo Run 'docker login' to login && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push
